meaningMnemonic: Go from a <radical>bow</radical> to a <radical>small</radical> <radical>gun</radical> and you're <kanji>increasing</kanji> in fire power! Even though the gun is small, it's still a step up from a bow.
readingMnemonic: You keep trading in weapons to get <kanji>increasing</kanji>ly stronger gear, when you realize that at the top of the list is... a <reading>Ya</reading>nkee's (や) baseball bat? Huh. I would have gone for a tank or a bazooka. But I guess if this will increase your power level, you have to go for it.
